item.title: Database Backup Overview | Stash
item.description: Database Backup Overview Stash 0.9.0+ supports backup and restore of any database. This guide will give you an overview of how database backup and restore works in Stash. How Backup Works The following diagram shows how Stash takes backup of a database. Open the image in a new tab to see the enlarged version. Fig: Database Backup Overview The backup process consists of the following steps: At first, a user creates a secret with access credentials of the backend where the backed up data will be stored.
